Encoders Notes
I dropped the source into vdubmod.
There i lowered the brightness & saturation,
increased the contrast & sharpened it.
Then i de-interlaced & de-noised it.
Finaly i changed the colors with a rgb eq
& muxed it to the line audio.
Well its nothing special, just your average cam.
Its blurry & has loads of dark scene's.
The colors on the source were way off,
I tried my best but there still not great.
I think i got it as good as i could without draining the 
color's out of people's face's.
Its just about watchable on your pc screen.
Download the sample first, to check your happy with the quality.
Enjoy...
